compounddef.title: SAI - QOS Queue specific API definitions.

detaileddescription.para: H/w Queue for all types of traffic
H/w Egress Unicast Queue
H/w Multicast Egress (Broadcast, Unknown unicast, Multicast) Queue
H/w Virtual Output Queue (VOQ). This queue is ingress unicast queue
H/w Virtual Output Queue (VOQ). This queue is fabric multicast queue
H/w Fabric Queue.
Custom range base value
In case of Hierarchical QOS not supported, the parent node is the port. Condition on whether Hierarchical QOS is supported or not, need to remove the MANDATORY_ON_CREATE FLAG when HQoS is introduced.
ID = SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID to disable WRED
This attribute represents the queue internal hardware state and is updated upon receiving PFC frames. True indicates the queue is paused.

briefdescription.para: Enable PFC Deadlock Detection and Recovery (DLDR) on a lossless queue.

detaileddescription.para: A deadlock is assumed to have occurred when a queue is in a XOFF state for more than a configurable (SAI_SWITCH_ATTR_PFC_TC_DLD_INTERVAL) amount of time.

briefdescription.para: Start PFC deadlock recovery on a lossless queue.

detaileddescription.para: If the attribute is true, start the recovery and ignore if recovery has been started. If the attribute is false, stop the recovery and ignore if recovery hasn't been started.

briefdescription.para: Queue bind point for TAM object.

detaileddescription.para: Custom range base value
End of custom range base

briefdescription.para: Enum defining Queue deadlock event state.
Enum defining Queue deadlock event state.
Notification data format received from SAI queue deadlock event callback.

memberdef.argsstring: )(_Out_ sai_object_id_t *queue_id, _In_ sai_object_id_t switch_id, _In_ uint32_t attr_count, _In_ const sai_attribute_t *attr_list)

simplesect.para: SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS on success, failure status code on error
SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS on success, failure status code on error

briefdescription.para: Get queue statistics counters. Deprecated for backward compatibility.

parameterdescription.para: Number of counters in the array
Specifies the array of counter ids
